weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.utilities

Class LinearAlgebraicCalculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.utilities.LinearAlgebraicCalculations

  • public class LinearAlgebraicCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of common calculation based on vectors and double arrays.
    Author:
    S

        calculates the squared euclidean distance between 2 double vectors/arrays of the same dimension

        Returns:
        the squared distance between both entities as primitive double value

      • getMinAndMaxValuesFromMatrix

        public static double[] getMinAndMaxValuesFromMatrix(Matrix matrix)
        Retrieves the minimal and maximal values in the given matrix at the same time, traversing every value only once.
        The returned array contains the minimal values at MINIMAL_INDEX = 0 and the maximal value at MAXIMAL_INDEX = 1.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix to retrieve minimal and maximal value from.
        Returns:
        An array with two entries containing minimal and maximal values.
